head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BERNSTEIN, FLORENCE (BOOK MAN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BERNSTEIN, FLORENCE (BOOK MAN)

block.p: BERNSTEIN - Florence (Book man), 89, Friday, Oct. 27. Beloved wife of the late Gad Bernstein. Devoted mother of Ellen Joy of Williamstown, MA,. & stepmother of David L. (Deborah Brudno) of Washington, DC. Loving aunt and friend. Memorial service Sunday October 29, 3 PM, The Riverside 180 West 76th St, NY. Contributions in her memory may be made to the Simon Wiesenthal Center or Good Samaritan Hospital in West Palm Beach, FL.
